summary.heading: Security Automation Certifications
summary.description: Brief intro. Short but enough to help practitioners take that next step. Suggestion is a max of 5 lines of content. Verify your basic automation skills. If you have passed the existing exams wait until the new version comes out to re-certify.

faqItems.content:
- Basic terminal skills
- Basic understanding of on premises and cloud architecture
